snippet: Mr. Masur, the former music director of the New York Philharmonic, was hospitalized for anemia, and a conducting seminar at the Manhattan School of Music was postponed until next year.
abstract: Mr. Masur, the former music director of the New York Philharmonic, was hospitalized for anemia, and a conducting seminar at the Manhattan School of Music was postponed until next year.

headline.main: Kurt Masur Conducting Seminar Is Postponed
